title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.19 - The field
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.19 - The field

State Regulations

When more betting interests are programmed to start in
a race than can be accommodated by the track's tote commission, those separate
betting interests in excess of the maximum number that can be so accommodated
shall be combined with one other such separate interest into a betting field. The composition of the field shall be selected by the racing secretary prior to
program time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4009.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
